configSelect.label: Config changer
configSelect.pleaseWait: Please wait until your new config is loaded!

modal.title: Choose the name of your new config

configNotCopied.title: Unable to copy config
configNotCopied.message: Your config was not copied as {{configName}}

deleteFailedDefaultConfig.title: Default config can't be deleted
deleteFailedDefaultConfig.message: Configuration was not deleted from the file system

invalidConfig.title: Unable to load config
invalidConfig.message: Could not load your config. Invalid JSON format.

accept.title: Configuration Upload
accept.text: Drag files here to upload a config. Support for JSON files only.

reject.title: Drag and Drop Upload rejected
reject.text: This file format is not supported. Please only upload JSON files.
